page.title: 14SONDES PLACE SCHOOL
page.content: Sondes Place School is a {comprehensive school,}in Dorking in Longfield road.{Mr Webb}has been the headmaster for four years. The school is split into three buildings, the huts were built in 1949, the hall in 1959, and the main building in 1969. There are about{815 children}in the school with the average number of {48 staff.} The school has an intake of 190 children a year at 12 years old. Pupils leave at 16 or stay until 18. The school has a{swimming pool, it is heated by{heat exchangers.} The school has seven tennis courts which children play on at lunchtimes. Sondes Place School is a good school to go to for a good education. Pupils leave for jobs or higher education, including university.
